commits.message: EUCA-13344 Added changes per sjones review comments
EUCA-13344 added update rollback cleanup as appropriate workflow type for checking update during delete

EUCA-13344 Added Rollback workflow for Cloudformation, and monitoring workflows for all workflows to deal with stuck stacks in all situations.  Eased delete restrictions if status is UPDATE_*_IN_PROGRESS and workflows are terminated, and created a couple of utility methods in StackAdminUtils.java that can allow an admin to cancel all workflows or remove a stack immediately (just metadata).

Squashed commit of the following:
